definitions.text: the civilization of Muslims collectively which is governed by the Muslim religion
examples: Islam is predominant in northern Africa, the Middle East, Pakistan, and Indonesia

definitions.text: the monotheistic religious system of Muslims founded in Arabia in the 7th century and based on the teachings of Muhammad as laid down in the Koran
examples: Islam is a complete way of life, not a Sunday religion
the term Muhammadanism is offensive to Muslims who believe that Allah, not Muhammad, founded their religion
